questions.quote: Jerry, it's Sophie. I can't believe you don't recognize my voice.
That's where they filmed the movie. It's supposed to inspire me.
yes.. alright buddy, take it easy Kramer you down to it George? what's wrong?
...and I, of course, will return to mine. Kudos, Elaine, on a job... done.
That reminds me, I'm not getting you guys any more fruit. That guy was eyeballing me the whole time. He gave me the creeps. All right, you owe me twenty-eight sixty.
You told David Putty your move and you didn't tell *me*? I *need* a move. You know I have no moves, Jerry.  Gimme a bite.
Excuse me. I believe you just ate my Twix bar. It was dangling. And when you purchased your Twix bar, you got a little freebie, and you never bothered to ask why, or seek out its rightful owner.
Uh, yeah.  Hey uncle Leo, I hope I wasn't uh, rude to you that day I bumped into you on the street. Uh, I really did have to get to a meeting.
Oh, you can have mine. I'll ship it out to you.  But what about that big apartment on West End Avenue?
Oh, is that what this is all about?! I bounce a cheque and you sold a Cadillac?!
